com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface ReportingClass

All Superinterfaces:
com.cboe.interfaces.domain.DomainBase
public interface ReportingClass
extends com.cboe.interfaces.domain.DomainBase

A collection of products in the same product class that are grouped for reporting purposes.

Method Detail

addProduct

void addProduct(Product newProduct)
Adds a Product to the reporting class. The given product must be of the same type as the reporting class.

Parameters:
newProduct - product to be added

getContractSize

int getContractSize()
Gets size of contracts for this reporting class. The size of contracts is the number of underlying products that each derivative product represents.

Returns:
size of contracts

Gets the products that belong to this reporting class.

Parameters:
activeOnly - if true restricts the result to be only products that are active
Returns:
array of products
